column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.1
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Attitude__|Label|Polarity
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Graduation|Kind|Scaling
#Text=The U.S. refused to recognize Canada's internal waterway the Northwest Passage sovereignty.
#Text=It challenged Canada claim by sailing war ships and subs through the Passage without notifying Canada.
#Text=Just like any waters in the world it claims dominance.
#Text=So be very careful about the Yanks.
#Text=And not be stupid supporting its hegemony as the writer of this article clearly do.Canada and U.S. are allies in mutual defense.
#Text=That's quite OK.
#Text=But mutual defense DOES NOT mean we get dragged into it global wars of power and dominance.
#Text=This is called the Pierre Trudeau Doctrine.
#Text=The basis for Canada refusal to join in America war of ideology and hegemony in Vietnam, war of profit, power and religion in Iraq.
#Text=Obama, a Nobel Peace Prize holder (but not winner), is responsible for initiating two potential global wars of the 21st century - new Cold War with Russia, War with China.
#Text=It's all about power and profit.
#Text=The Pentagon even commissioned a study by the Rand Corporation on how to fight a war with China, report just released.
#Text=U.S. government sees China rise and activities in the S.
#Text=China Sea as a direct challenge to its claimed global hegemony.
#Text=There is some truth to it.
#Text=American Navy currently can block all sea traffic on the Malacca Strait to chock off China.
#Text=It has stationed forces in Singapore.
#Text=China response to this threat is part of settling the borders on the South China Sea.
#Text=A settlement to its favor is to enable China to defend the Malacca Strait blockage.
#Text=If it works, America claim of global dominance will have a big limp cut off.
#Text=Now what is Canada going to do with America challenge to our NWP sovereignty.
#Text=Cry and beg?
#Text=No, build a fleet of Arctic Offshore Patrol Boats, lightly armed, to act as surveillance and intruder trigger.
#Text=There is only one force the U.S. empire mongers understand - Force.
